ai_summary.Response: These commits primarily update metadata across various Microsoft Entra ID and Permissions Management documentation pages. Several files see minor changes to the `ms.custom` or `ms.service` attributes, often standardising them to `identity-platform`. Notably, multiple pages within the Permissions Management section have updated retirement dates for the product, shifting the discontinuation from October 1, 2025, to November 1, 2025. There are also a few instances of author and manager metadata being updated or corrected.
